import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef, useCallback } from "react"; import { Link, Route, Routes, Navigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { Chart } from "chart.js"; import ProductDataService from "../../Services/Barcelparts.js" //Creates the React function that will be rendered in the app Page through routes const Product = function () { window.addEventListener('load', function() { // Fetch all the forms we want to apply custom Bootstrap validation styles to var forms = document.getElementsByClassName('needs-validation'); // Loop over them and prevent submission forms.addEventListener('submit', function(event) { if (forms.checkValidity() === false) { event.preventDefault(); event.stopPropagation(); } forms.classList.add('was-validated'); console.log("Submited") }, false); }); const handleChange = event => { } const handleSubmit = event => { } return (
